com.intel.jndn.utils

Class SimpleServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.jndn.utils.server.ServerBaseImpl
      • com.intel.jndn.utils.SimpleServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DynamicServer, Server, Runnable, net.named_data.jndn.OnInterest

    public class SimpleServer
extends ServerBaseImpl
implements DynamicServer
    Implementation of a DynamicServer that wraps the OnInterest callback with some encoding and pipeline support.
    Author:
    Andrew Brown

      void onInterest(net.named_data.jndn.Name prefix, net.named_data.jndn.Interest interest, net.named_data.jndn.transport.Transport transport, long registeredPrefixId)
      void respondUsing(RespondWithBlob callback)
      Convenience method for responding to an Interest by returning the Blob content only; when an Interest arrives, this method wraps the returned Blob with a Data using the exact Name of the incoming Interest.
      void respondUsing(RespondWithData callback)
      Set the callback method to run when an Interest packet is passed to this server.

    • Method Detail

      • respondUsing

        public void respondUsing(RespondWithData callback)
                  throws IOException
        Set the callback method to run when an Interest packet is passed to this server. This method should either return a Data packet that satisfies the Interest or throw an Exception to avoid sending. Calling this method a second time should replace the callback.
        Specified by:
        respondUsing in interface DynamicServer
        Parameters:
        callback - the callback instance
        Throws:
        IOException - if the server fails to register a prefix

      • respondUsing

        public void respondUsing(RespondWithBlob callback)
                  throws IOException
        Convenience method for responding to an Interest by returning the Blob content only; when an Interest arrives, this method wraps the returned Blob with a Data using the exact Name of the incoming Interest.
        Parameters:
        callback - the callback function to retrieve content when an Interest arrives
        Throws:
        IOException - if the server fails to register a prefix

              long registeredPrefixId)
        Specified by:
